clueHunt.heading: Welcome to the Holmer Green village clue trail
clueHunt.subheading:
Below is a list of clues that will take you on a little walking tour of our lovely village.
All the answers consist of up to three words or a number (enter 4 not four).
To save your answers and check how many you have right, just tap a Check Answers button.

The trail begins at the junction of Sawpit Hill/Watchet Lane and Wycombe Road and runs in a loop (about 2.5km).

Have fun and and observe government advice on social distancing
clueHunt.success: Completed the trail you have! Strong the village is with you in it!

clues.text: Add up all the distances on the signs at the junction
Heading along Wycombe Road, what is the street number of the business for which this forms part of the logo?
What type of road is Dean Way?
What is the phone number (no spaces) for the business that uses this logo?
What is the second word of the street name?
What's the phone number (no spaces) for the business that uses this in its logo?
Who does the fox remember?
Multiply the number of these flower beds by the number of duck houses
What region does this give you a taste of?
What's the first word in the business name that is at this address?
Before you cross the road to the pond, cherry pick the number of nines
Subtract the distance to Gt Kingshill from the distance to Little Missenden
How old is Holmer Green now?
Carefully cross over on to New Pond Road.  What are the initials of this building?
What adjective is used in the name of this public house?
Turn left on to Beech Tree Road. How many r's are in the name of the owners of this building?
Pull or push?
What's missing from this picture?
Turn left on to Watchet Lane. Which flowers look after children here?
What's missing from this sign?
How many sports are mentioned on the sign that features this?
What is the house number by this?
